name: Flux Mobile Design Kit (Community)
description:
Build beautiful Figma prototypes in minutes.

Let’s face it, creating beautiful seamless prototypes is time consuming.

It requires thoughtful organization and a large amount of mental capacity.


I created Flux Design System to simplify prototyping.

Built from the ground up with a prototype first mindset, Flux Design System gives you the power to build amazing Figma prototypes fast. Components are organized to get the most out of Figma’s interactive components.



Click Duplicate to get your copy.
